meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being snobbish.
meanings.sent1: Her snobbishness was evident in the way she looked down on people.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate his snobbishness towards those who are less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snobbishness, she couldn't resist laughing at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: His snobbishness was like a dark cloud overshadowing the party.
meanings.sent5: The snobbishness of the queen made her subjects feel unworthy.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude of someone who believes they are superior to others.
meanings.sent1: His snobbishness made it hard for others to approach him.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her snobbishness by refusing to talk to anyone she deemed beneath her.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snobbishness, he secretly admired the talent of his peers.
meanings.sent4: The snobbishness of the celebrity was like a barrier between her and her fans.
meanings.sent5: The snobbishness in his tone made it clear he thought highly of himself.

meanings.definition: Displaying a condescending attitude towards others based on perceived social status.
meanings.sent1: Her snobbishness behavior made others feel small and unimportant.
meanings.sent2: The snobbishness attitude of the wealthy couple was off-putting to their neighbors.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snobbishness remarks, he couldn't hide his excitement for the event.
meanings.sent4: The snobbishness look on her face made it clear she thought she was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent5: His snobbishness behavior at the party alienated many of the guests.
